summary: A serial killer mutates with a chemical inside a sewer, to become a monster made of human waste just as the FBI and police are onto him.
cast: Paul Weiner|Beth West|Dan Burr|Dan West|Rick Popko|Dan Ellis|Timm Carney|Hannah Stangel|Brad Dosland|Mark Pirro|Donny Gonzales|Ken Dashner|Raoul Simpson|Dave Sutton|Dave Dumanis|Lisa Rein|Dalia Vidor|Tony Adams|Michael West|Peter Stangel|Cameron Stangel|Scott Britton|Bev Popko|Molly Britton|Wiley Price|Kip Phillips|Liz Kintzele|Alan Fear|Jon McAllister|Troy Brophy|Cindy Johnson|Darren Gladstone|Eliot Van Buskirk|Jesse Berney|Jennifer Kim|Andrew Deemer|Melissa Dunn|Jeffery Wachs|Phillip Dyer|Kaliel Roberts|Clay Popko|Husni Hijazi|Matt Elliott|Sarah Brook|Joseph Clark|Justine Nguyen|Donald Bradley|Ryan Coleman|Ryan MacDonald|Adam Gillitt|Navarro Brooks|Trish O'Flinn|Wendy Britton|Paul Britton|Mitchell Britton|Joe Ortega|June Bohr|Becky West|Kathy Bohr|Stacey Jacobs|Jack Deshiell|Melody Cortes|Lucas N. title: El ataque de la montaña de mierda
